title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
Inspiration Guide

All characters can gain Inspiration based on their Background when your party completes content in a specific way. Karlach has an Outlander background, so her inspiration boosts are:

Walking on Air (Successfully use a fairy ring) Sticky Fingers (Secure the pouch from the spider crevice.) A Mother's Fury (Triumph over the mother Owlbear. Conving her not to attack is sufficient) Rock Steady (Disarming bandit's rolling boulder trap.) Cursebreaker (Discover the curse of Yeenoghu
